title: Example Product Structure for Madame Ko
description: This file shows the structure of products that work with the existing Shopify integration

exampleProduct.title: Radiant Seoul Serum
exampleProduct.description: A luxurious Korean-inspired serum that combines the best of Seoul's clean beauty with Parisian elegance. Infused with ginseng, niacinamide, and hyaluronic acid to brighten, hydrate, and revitalize your skin.
exampleProduct.descriptionHtml:
A luxurious Korean-inspired serum that combines the best of Seoul's clean beauty with Parisian elegance.

Key Ingredients:

  • Red Ginseng Extract - Revitalizes and energizes
  • Niacinamide - Brightens and evens skin tone
  • Hyaluronic Acid - Deep hydration

howToAddInShopify.step1: Go to Shopify Admin > Products > Add product
howToAddInShopify.step2: Fill in Title and Description (use rich text editor for formatted content)
howToAddInShopify.step6: Add tags: 'featured' for homepage, 'bestseller', category tags
howToAddInShopify.step8: Save and the product will automatically appear in your Next.js app
